member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_HITTEST_TYPE
member.summary: Defines how hit testing is handled by Direct Manipulation when using a dedicated hit-test thread registered through RegisterHitTestTarget.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_HITTEST_TYPE.DIRECTMANIPULATION_HITTEST_TYPE_ASYNCHRONOUS
member.summary: The hit-test thread receives WM_POINTERDOWN messages and specifies whether to call SetContact. If SetContact is not called, the contact will not be associated with a viewport.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_HITTEST_TYPE.DIRECTMANIPULATION_HITTEST_TYPE_SYNCHRONOUS
member.summary: The UI thread always receives WM_POINTERDOWN messages after the hit-test thread. A call to SetContact is not required.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_HITTEST_TYPE.DIRECTMANIPULATION_HITTEST_TYPE_AUTO_SYNCHRONOUS
member.summary: The UI thread receives WM_POINTERDOWN messages only when SetContact isn't called by the hit-test thread.
